landingPage.description: A comprehensive platform helping you start your Ausbildung path in Germany from scratch independently. It provides explanations for learning the language and preparing for the B2 TELC exam, a list of required documents for application, and professional preparation of CV and motivation letter. It also explains how to search for a contract, prepare for job interviews with ready questions, then the steps for visa application and document preparation. Additionally, you'll find a simplified explanation of the study system, exams, and holidays in Germany to help you integrate and succeed.
landingPage.heroDescription: A comprehensive platform helping you start your Ausbildung path in Germany from scratch independently. It provides explanations for learning the language and preparing for the B2 TELC exam, a list of required documents for application, and professional preparation of CV and motivation letter. It also explains how to search for a contract, prepare for job interviews with ready questions, then the steps for visa application and document preparation. Additionally, you'll find a simplified explanation of the study system, exams, and holidays in Germany to help you integrate and succeed.

footer.startJourneyDesc: Get updates on new courses, visa requirements, and opportunities to move to Germany. Join thousands of Tunisians preparing for their German adventure.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Your journey to Germany in four simple steps
howItWorks.step1Description: Take our personalized assessment to identify the best pathway for your goals‚Äîwhether it's studying, working, or living in Germany.
howItWorks.step2Description: Follow our expert-led courses covering everything from German language to visa requirements and cultural integration.
howItWorks.step3Description: Get step-by-step guidance through the visa application process with document checklists and expert review.
howItWorks.step4Description: Arrive prepared and confident. Join our community of successful students and professionals already living their German dream.

pathways.title: Choose Your German Pathway
pathways.subtitle: Whether you're pursuing education, career opportunities, or a new life in Germany, we have a tailored pathway for your journey.
pathways.studyDescription: Master the German university system, ace your language tests, and secure your student visa‚Äîall in one structured pathway.
pathways.workDescription: Land your dream job with Germany's top employers. Learn job search strategies, CV optimization, and interview skills from industry experts.
pathways.liveDescription: Integrate seamlessly into German life. From finding housing to understanding culture, we'll guide you every step of the way.

faq.title: Most Frequent Questions
faq.subtitle: Get quick answers to common questions about moving to Germany. Watch short video guides directly below.
faq.noCoursesAvailable: No FAQ courses available at the moment.

finalCTA.title: Ready to Start Your
finalCTA.description: Join 2,500+ students and professionals who've successfully moved to Germany with our expert guidance. Your dream is closer than you think.
finalCTA.trustBadge: üîí No credit card required ‚Ä¢ üéì Trusted by 2,500+ students ‚Ä¢ ‚≠ê 4.9/5 rating

call.title: Book a Quick Call
call.subtitle: Get instant answers to your questions about studying, working, or living in Germany
call.bookCallDescription: Choose a convenient 30-minute time slot for a quick consultation.

benefits.confirmationDesc: Immediate email with call details and link
benefits.remindersDesc: Never miss your call with automated reminders
benefits.browserBasedDesc: No apps needed - join from any browser
benefits.flexibleDesc: Cancel or reschedule up to 24 hours before

call.faq1Question: What should I prepare before the call?
call.faq1Answer: Have your questions ready and any relevant documents (academic transcripts, work experience, etc.) that might help us provide better guidance.
call.faq2Answer: Yes, you can reschedule up to 24 hours before your scheduled time through the confirmation email you'll receive.
call.faq3Question: What if I need more time?
call.faq3Answer: If you need more in-depth consultation, we can schedule a 60-minute meeting or provide additional resources after the call.

resume.formDescription: Fill in your details and we'll create your professional resume

form.desiredTraining: Which training do you want to do?
form.driverLicense: Do you have a driver's license?
form.bacObtainedDate: If yes, when did you obtain your baccalaureate?
form.bacStudiedDate: If no, when did you study for your baccalaureate?
form.bacHighSchool: In which high school did you obtain your baccalaureate?
form.bacCity: In which city is your high school located?
form.postBacStudies: What did you study after high school? Where and when?
form.postBacStudiesPlaceholder: Example: Bachelor's degree in Mathematics: Faculty of Sciences of Tunis: 09/2022‚Äì06/2024
form.internships: What internships have you done? Where and when?
form.internshipsPlaceholder: Example: Internship at Hannibal Clinic: 08/2024‚Äì09/2024: Hannibal Clinic: Tunis
form.trainings: What training have you completed? Where and when?
form.trainingsPlaceholder: Example: First Aid Training: Red Crescent: Tunis: 03/2024‚Äì04/2024
form.experiencePlaceholder: Example: Nursing assistant at City Hospital (2020-2023): Patient care, vital signs monitoring, medication administration assistance...
form.educationPlaceholder: Example: Nursing Diploma from Medical Institute (2019), First Aid Certificate, Patient Care Training...
form.skillsPlaceholder: Example: Patient care, wound care, vital signs monitoring, medication management, elderly care, communication skills, empathy, teamwork...

resume.termsNotice: By submitting, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

bookConsultation.title: Book a Consultation Meeting
bookConsultation.subtitle: In-depth consultation to create your personalized roadmap to Germany
bookConsultation.chooseTimeSlot: Choose a convenient time slot for your personalized consultation with our expert advisors.
bookConsultation.instantConfirmationDesc: Receive immediate email confirmation with meeting details
bookConsultation.automatedRemindersDesc: Get reminders 30 minutes before and at meeting time
bookConsultation.inPlatformVideoDesc: Join directly from your browser - no downloads needed
bookConsultation.easyReschedulingDesc: Cancel or reschedule up to 24 hours before
bookConsultation.whatToExpect: What to Expect in Your Meeting
bookConsultation.beforeMeetingDesc: You'll receive a pre-meeting questionnaire to help us understand your background, goals, and current situation. This ensures we make the most of our time together.
bookConsultation.duringMeetingDesc: We'll review your situation, discuss your options for studying or working in Germany, create a timeline, and address any specific concerns or questions you have.
bookConsultation.afterMeetingDesc: You'll receive a detailed action plan, recommended resources, document checklists, and ongoing support via email for follow-up questions.
